plot: An unhappy husband murders his miserable wife for insurance purposes. Unfortunately, he just can't get rid of his wife as she comes back from the dead.
title: Housewife from Hell
plot_es: An unhappy husband murders his miserable wife for insurance purposes. Unfortunately, he just can't get rid of his wife as she comes back from the dead.
plot_en: An unhappy husband murders his miserable wife for insurance purposes. Unfortunately, he just can't get rid of his wife as she comes back from the dead.
